Parameters: int: The number of pixels to scroll by horizontally.
int: The number of pixels to scroll by vertically.
scrollTargetBy(int, int).Description: Override this method to scroll the target view by the specified number of pixels.

Returns: true if the target view is able to vertically scroll in the specified direction.
Parameters: int: Negative to check scrolling up, positive to check scrolling down.
canTargetScrollVertically(int).Description: Override this method to return whether the target view can be scrolled vertically in a certain direction.

Returns: true if the target view is able to horizontally scroll in the specified direction.
Parameters: int: Negative to check scrolling left, positive to check scrolling right.
canTargetScrollHorizontally(int).Description: Override this method to return whether the target view can be scrolled horizontally in a certain direction.

ClassDesc: An implementation of @B_android#support#v4#widget#AutoScrollHelper_E@ that knows how to scroll through a https:##developer#android#com@B_android#widget#ListView_E@.
